title: LoL Client/game Crashing randomly and frequent disconects from Pvp.net
body:
The game just doesn't wortk for me, disconecting from Pvp.net and randomly crashing, making me lose LP for "Leaving" games
Ingame I have the same problem, the game crashes like two times every game with the nice message: Failed to create dump file.

Right now this game is unplayable

replies.body: i found an article from a forum post like 2 years ago where ppl had this same issue. it seemed to be their graphics driver that was causing the problem. they either needed to update it or revert back to the previous one. idk if this is your issue or not but it cant hurt to try it out or look into it :-/ they also said it was only for nvidia graphics cards
I have amd, so that won't work for me. :( I thought it was a problem with windows 10, but it supports direct 10 etc. Don't know about the other programs that league needs
